body: Please avoid reformatting code you’re not touching... it’s not a good style, makes your diff unnecessarily larger, and makes reviewing harder because it adds noise
body_html: Please avoid reformatting code you’re not touching... it’s not a good style, makes your diff unnecessarily larger, and makes reviewing harder because it adds noise
body_text: Please avoid reformatting code you’re not touching... it’s not a good style, makes your diff unnecessarily larger, and makes reviewing harder because it adds noise
